cab.content: Military Secret.081:nFrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,UhJuly 1919.(Received 7th.)No. 9092. 5th July. Malleson wires 3rd July that information dated 29th June received from Sarakhs that two parties of Afghans have gone to Khiva whence intend visiting Yarmut country. They are engaged on Pan-Islamic propaganda and carry a sword and Afghan decoration from Amir for Khan of Khiva.
